Título: EXCESS OF TIME IN REACHING OIL PRESSURE THE HEAD LUBRICATION CIRCUIT
Descripción: The pressure switch G10-B19, which checks the oil pressure of this circuit, is detecting an insufficient pressure. NOTE: we recommend to replace the filters periodically.

Preguntas.Texto: 1. For the correct operation of the head lubrication, the pump must generate a pressure of not less than 20 bar. When the pump G10-M31 works, does it generate more than 20 bar of pressure (if necessary, plug the outlet with a steel ball)?
1.1. Check pump (pressure adjustment) and circuit and output filter (internal leakage of the pump?). Does the alarm dissappear?

Respuestas.Mensaje: Problem fixed: [pump wrongly adjusted or dirty filters]
Check lubrication line, between pump and dosifiers (AA3), may be there is an oil leaking.

Preguntas.Texto: 1.2. Adjust pressure to 20 bar, remove the steel ball.
2. Is the pressure at the input of the pressure switch more than 20 bar?

Respuestas.Mensaje: Check lubrication pipe. May be there is any kind of oil leaking.

Preguntas.Texto: 2.1. Check the setting of the pressure switch and its wiring. Does the alarm dissappear?

Respuestas.Mensaje: Problem fixed: [pressure switch wrongly adjusted or wiring defect]
Change pressure swith and its wiring, if necessary.
